testimonials.testimonial: I and many of my friends visit their site daily or at least weekly, and I often link them on Mantic Mondays.
testimonials.name: Scott Alexander

testimonials.testimonial: Manifold is engaging, great for testing out my predictions, and ultimately a ton of fun to play with!
testimonials.name: Anthony Giovannetti

testimonials.testimonial: I've now been seriously using manifold.markets for like a couple of weeks and I would slay anybody who tried to stop me
testimonials.name: Eliezer Yudkowsky

testimonials.testimonial: My viewers have been using this site to track in-community humor for a while now and all of them love how simple it is to use.
testimonials.name: Destiny
